responses.rationale: Reports a bare positive fact ('no human cases detected') without explicit calming language.
Reports a bare negation ('will not enter the food system') without explicit calming language or the keyword 'safe'.
Reports a bare negation and a capability statement ('strongest AI surveillance program') without explicit calming language or a link to public safety.
Reports a capability statement and a bare negation ('do not present an immediate public health concern') without explicit calming language.
Reports facts about the source of spread without explicit calming language.
Provides advice on biosecurity, not an explicit calming cue about current safety.
Reports a low likelihood ('pretty rare') but lacks an intensifier or explicit calming keywords.
Reports monitoring activity, not an explicit calming cue about current safety.
Reports a bare positive fact ('no cases have been found') without explicit calming language.
